definition: Longhua county in Chengde 承德[Cheng2 de2], Hebei
surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Long Huaxian beautiful environment, rich in resources.
